overview: Jovan is a Serbian immigrant whose wife has just died in child labor. He moves to Los Angeles to live with his wifeâ€™s twin sister, with whom he discovers a kindred romance. Jovan takes a job as a ride share driver, and finds himself in trouble using drugs and promiscuous sex to cope with loss. Living in a new world beyond his control, Jovan is anointed by visions of his wife that keep him on a path to salvation.
title: In Dire Need of Compassion
